original_text: For many, of whom I have often told you and now tell you even with tears, walk as enemies of the cross of Christ.
korean_text: 내가 여러 번 너희에게 말하였거니와 이제도 눈물을 흘리며 말하노니 여러 사람들이 그리스도의 십자가의 원수로 행하느니라

sentences.original_text: of whom I have often told you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 여러 번 말했던 사람들,

sentences.original_text: and now tell you even with tears,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 지금은 눈물을 흘리며 너희에게 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: walk as enemies of the cross of Christ.
